Comments.Message:
I'll try to get it added...

...But that said, you're really just doing something terribly wrong with your rotation if you're having *sustained* threat issues. Make sure you're optimally doing your rotation (Mauling on every single auto attack, Mangling on every single cooldown, FFFing in every cooldown between Mangles, keeping Lacerate rolling, Swiping otherwise).
(And the ICC damage buff has almost nothing to do with it. Your threat scales almost as well with the damage buff as the DPS')

This missing enchant is bugging me too.

And it may be true that you're doing something wrong if you're having sustained threat issues *versus equally geared people* but that isn't always a valid assumption.  What if you're gearing up an alt and tanking heroics in blues and a few epics vs. people in ICC gear, or if you're normally a healer but have made a bear offspec with a few feral cast-offs and are trying to tank an ICC-10 with people who have ICC-25 DPS gear.

Having this enchant in the model would be nice for bears who are undergeared relative to the DPS they're running with and want to tweak their gear to push their threat a bit higher.
